ygData.subject: Re: Apology and some Comments
ygData.msgSnippet: You re missing an required component of it.  You can drag the hand-weapon slots to the hot key banks like you drag the inventory slots... Slyde ... From: Papa
ygData.messageBody:
You're missing an required component of it. You can drag the hand-weapon
slots to the hot key banks like you drag the inventory slots...

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: Papa Legba <legba@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 10:03 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Apology and some Comments


> From: Papa Legba <legba@...>
>
> After I pick up the item from the hot key bank, how do I get it into my
> hand?
>
> For example. I have a drum in my hand, and get jumped while I'm
> running. I have a mino axe in my inv (on the hot key bank) How Do i
> Get the axe into my hand?
> --
> We now return to the non-stop rock.
>
> Matt DeBarger
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
